title: Douglas Marques
subtitle:
Murderous little world once our objects had gazes. Our lives
     Were fragile, the wind
 Could dash them away. Here lies the refugee breather
     Who drank a bowl of elsewhere.

title: Chile Today News
subtitle: #Bolivia Morales and four former parliamentarians arrived in Argentina as asylum seekers. He will soon be given refugee status. title: Kelly Werthmann
subtitle: This is Saliha Sulieman...a refugee from Eritrea & beloved mother of five. She was killed in a hit & run yesterday; the driver of an RV drove up on the sidewalk. Her niece tells me Saliha was like a mother to her, always encouraging her to pursue education & follow her dreams. pic.twitter.com/mhnIwRz4bG
